streamCiphers.name: Caesar Cipher
streamCiphers.description: A substitution cipher where each letter in the text is shifted by a certain number of places.

streamCiphers.name: Monoalphabetic Cipher
streamCiphers.description: A substitution cipher where each letter of the plaintext is replaced by another letter.

streamCiphers.name: Vigen√®re Cipher
streamCiphers.description: A method of encrypting alphabetic text using a simple form of polyalphabetic substitution.

blockCiphers.name: Block Cipher
blockCiphers.description: A symmetric key cipher that encrypts data in fixed-size blocks, typically 64 or 128 bits.
